page.title: 09THE CREAMERY
page.content: THE CREAMERY EMPLOYS A TOTAL OF 32 WORKERS- MANAGEMENT(2),LABORATORY ASSISTANT(1), CLERICAL(6),DRIVERS(7),CHECKERS(2), SUPERVISOR(1),UNIT OPERATORS(13). FIVE OF THESE ARE BASED IN HAWICK. MILK IS DELIVERED TO HAWICK,SELKIRK,KELSO,JEDBURGH,PEEBLES, ALL AROUND GALASHIELS AND EVEN TO EDINBURGH. LARGE MILK TANKERS COME DAILY FROM FARMS - 30,000 GALLONS PER WEEK.CREAM IS ALSO MADE.IT TAKES 13 GALLONS OF MILK TO MAKE 1 GALLON OF CREAM. THERE IS ONE BOTTLING MACHINE AND TWO CARTON MACHINES. ALL MILK IS PASTEURISED AND DISTRIBUTED AS FOLLOWS:-1/3PT CARTONS,1/2PT CARTONS,1PINT CARTONS,2 PINT (QUART)CARTONS,1PINT BOTTLES,1/2GALLON AND 3 GALLON CONTAINERS.
